thread.title: Paraclipse Introduces Fruit Fly Patrol Insect Control System
thread.title_full: Paraclipse Introduces Fruit Fly Patrol Insect Control System

title: Paraclipse Introduces Fruit Fly Patrol Insect Control System
text:
Subscribe Paraclipse Introduces Fruit Fly Patrol Insect Control System The system combines a UVA light designed for fruit fly intensity preference along with insect decoys and chemical attractants to attract and capture fruit flies. October 13, 2015 COLUMBUS, Neb. — Paraclipse's new “Fruit Fly Patrol” combines a UVA light designed for fruit fly intensity preference along with insect decoys and chemical attractants all specifically chosen to attract and capture fruit flies while its attractive enclosure is stylish enough for use in restaurants, nightclubs and other public spaces. Fruit Fly Patrol uses the proprietary Paraclipse Capture Cartridge, a long lasting cartridge that is clean and easy to replace. The product is certified for use in food service areas and is both UL Listed and CE Compliant. Fruit Fly Patrol may be ordered immediately from Paraclipse distributors in the USA and will be available internationally later this year. Visit Paraclipse at www.paraclipse.com , or email info@paraclipse.com to request more information Related Expanded Label for Contrac All-Weather Blox October 16, 2015 
Bell Laboratories announced that Contrac All-Weather Blox is now available with an amended label for approved use on 11 additional species. Read More Service Pro to Debut ServeSensor at PestWorld October 16, 2015 
ServSensor is a sensor-based monitoring device and software solution that keeps an eye on activity in bait stations, traps, and sends notice of all occurring wildlife and rodent activity. Read More ‘Duck Dynasty’ Star Si to Appear at Oldham Chemicals PestWorld Booth October 15, 2015 
Oldham Chemicals Company invites PestWorld '15 attenddees to its booth (#441) to meet Si Robertson, one of the stars of the reality television program "Duck Dynasty." Read More The Pulse
